data.title: University Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia Faculty of Civil and Environmental Engineering Department of Civil Engineering Technology
data.meta_description: LABSHEET TRABAS - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides instructions for a practical lab on establishing a horizontal control network through traversing. The objectives are to expose students to fieldwork procedures for horizontal control surveys. Key steps include planning traverse stations, establishing a datum point, measuring angles and distances between stations, processing the raw data to determine coordinates and errors, and producing a plan using surveying software. Precautions are outlined such as transporting equipment carefully and maintaining batteries.
data.text: University Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia Faculty of Civil and Environmental Engineering Department of Civil Engineering Technology
